item.description:
Hike or Snowshoe Mine Falls Nashua

Monday Jan. 16th., 1pm.

Mine Falls

off of exit 6 rt. 3

Coliseum Ave,

Nashua, NH

Host: Steve Obermiller   603-491-1962    ob@tds.net
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!

We will meet at 1:00 pm in the lot at the end of Coliseum Ave, which is off of Rte 130 & exit 6 off of rt 3 in Nashua.

Join us afterwards for drinks and food at Shorty's up the road, in front of the Nashua Mall between 2;30 & 3pm.

 Steve O. wrote:

  This park is just full of beautiful views. So, come on out and enjoy some fresh air, beautiful views, and all this while in good company of new and old friends. As always, I will do my best to make sure everyone gets introduce. They say it will be warmer. So, it should be fun to get out and do a hiking, or snow shoeing, or cross country skiing on the trails at Mine Falls Park in Nashua. Unless we get a snow storm before Monday. It will be a hike. Please know that our intent is to enjoy the view of this area, and to chat along the way.  This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout.   We should enjoy a two or three hours hike, with a few breaks and stops along the trail.

 DIRECTIONS:  Take exit 6 from Route 3 (Route 130) and go west towards Brookline, take the second entrance to the shopping center area (Colliseum Ave), go all the way to the end of the road for the parking lot.  Look for the meetup sign.

Please remember to bring plenty of fluids and to dress in layers so that you will be comfortable the whole time we are out on the trails. 

If anyone cares to, we can then go grab a bite to eat or enjoy a hot chocolate, at a nearby restaurant.

This event is at no cost.   I hope to see you there.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Hike or Snowshoe Mine Falls Nashua
